Date: Friday, 1/31/1987
Subject: Contract offer
FYI- Cleveland has offered me a better contract!
They offer more than you can even dream about!

Regards,
Tony Phillips



Date: Friday, 1/31/1987
Subject: Contract offer
Please increase the number of years in your
offer. 3 years is definitely not enough!

Regards,
Chet Lemon



Date: Saturday, 2/1/1987
Subject: I'll sign elsewhere
Sorry, Cleveland has made the best overall offer.
I'll sign with them. Good luck this season!

Regards,
Tony Phillips

Sorry, California has made the best overall offer.

Chet Lemon

Regards,
George Foster

Regards,
George Foster



Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1987
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
The time has come. I'll leave the show after this year.
I guess I will have to make room for the young players.

Sincerely,
George Foster

Subject: Progress of Ken Griffey Jr.

He has an AVG of .368 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
